releaseNotes: Fixed intermittent bug when deleting zones
All Pulse effects now have both a loops and duration param that will clear when done
Added color params to all 8x8 matrix explosions
Fixed intermittent crash with clear all zones button in Companion
Added flip support for Pulse matrix devices in user installed them upside down
All 8x32 matrix effects will now scale on a 8x48 matrix
Added graphic equalizer effects fo Pulse devices for Spotify and Last.fm widgets
Changed to improved, single pixel font for Pixelcade Pulse dot matrix display
Smooth scrolling for the Pulse dot matrix display
